101.title: Understanding Anxiety Disorders
101.summary: Explore the causes of anxiety and the various ways to manage it.

102.title: Anxiety and Depression Association of America
102.summary: Find strategies for dealing with depression and its symptoms.

103.title: Borderline Personality Disorder Resource Center
103.summary: Managing and adapting to persistent patterns of thoughts, feelings, and behaviors that deviate from cultural norms and cause distress or dysfunction in daily life.

104.title: National Alliance on Mental Illness - Schizophrenia
104.summary: Learning strategies to manage hallucinations, delusions, and disorganized thinking to improve functioning and reduce distress.

105.title: National Institute of Mental Health - Mood Disorders
105.summary: Developing skills to regulate mood swings, manage symptoms of depression or mania, and improve overall emotional well-being.

106.title: Depression and Bipolar Support Alliance
106.summary: Implementing techniques to reduce excessive worry, panic attacks, and avoidance behaviors, and to enhance relaxation and coping mechanisms.

107.title: Schizophrenia and Related Disorders Alliance of America
107.summary: Gaining insight into the causes, symptoms, and treatments of depression, and learning strategies to cope with low mood, lack of energy, and negative thoughts.
